title: Elder

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a dead player to turn into a Temporary Spirit. Temporary Spirits can speak in daychat the next day and vote as if they were alive. They can use their ability tonight.
- At night, while dead, you may Seance a living player, sending one message up to 100 words long to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Temporary Spirits still have their attributes and conditions from when they were alive. For example, a Vigilante with 2 bullets before they died will have 2 bullets as a Temporary Spirit.
- Temporary Spirits fade away at the start of the day afterwards.
- You can't turn a dead player into a Temporary Spirit if they were already one in the past.
- You can speak with the dead at night.
- __*Part of the Town Power Variety Pack*__
